document.full_text: la nina, a weather pattern characterized by colder ocean temperatures in the eastern equatorial pacific, may be playing a part in the high number of u.s. tornadoes this spring, according to an accuweather meteorologist.
document.title: la nina weather pattern may be factor in more tornadoes
lines_and_colors: la nina, a weather pattern characterized by colder ocean temperatures in the eastern equatorial pacific, may be playing a part in the high number of u.s. tornadoes this spring, according to an accuweather meteorologist.
